chunks.text:
From: Alya Al Ameeri <AAlameeri@amrc.ae> 
Sent: Monday, November 25, 2024 8:07 AM
To: Mohammed AL-AREQI <Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Grace Milan <Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com>; Rebecca Lane <RLane@amrc.ae>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>; May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>; Mary Janice Dofeliz <MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Chalhoub Group, Nars, Unit 10231, The Galleria Al Maryah Island - Trade Licence Renewal

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Mohammed,

 

Your ADGM trade licence is due to expire on 2 December 2024.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain your ADGM trade licence under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards,

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive
